statements: SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT * FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE hotspot_id < 10;
SELECT biodiversity_index FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE hotspot_name = 'Coral Reef';
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots ORDER BY hotspot_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(biodiversity_index) AS avg_biodiversity_index FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT * FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots ORDER BY hotspot_name DESC
SELECT hotspot_id, hotspot_name, location FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5
SELECT * FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE location LIKE '%Pacific%'
SELECT hotspot_id, hotspot_name, location, biodiversity_index FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hotspots FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index >= 5.0;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts;
SELECT conservation_organization, conservation_status FROM conservation_efforts;
SELECT hotspot_id, hotspot_name, location, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM biodiversity_hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_status = 'Active';
SELECT conservation_organization, hotspot_name FROM conservation_efforts JOIN biodiversity_hotspots ON conservation_efforts.hotspot_id = biodiversity_hotspots.hotspot_id;
SELECT hotspot_name, location, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_hotspots ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location_geometry FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT species_name, common_name, habitat_type FROM MarineSpecies;
SELECT hotspot_name, conservation_organization, conservation_status FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots JOIN ConservationEfforts ON MarineBiodiversityHotspots.hotspot_id = ConservationEfforts.hotspot_id;

SELECT species_name, common_name, habitat_type, hotspot_name, conservation_organization FROM MarineSpecies JOIN MarineBiodiversityHotspots ON MarineSpecies.hotspot_id = MarineBiodiversityHotspots.hotspot_id JOIN ConservationEfforts ON MarineSpecies.hotspot_id = ConservationEfforts.hotspot_id;
SELECT * FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location_geometry FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE hotspot_id = 1;

SELECT ConservationEfforts.hotspot_id, ConservationEfforts.conservation_organization, MarineBiodiversityHotspots.hotspot_name FROM ConservationEfforts JOIN MarineBiodiversityHotspots ON ConservationEfforts.hotspot_id = MarineBiodiversityHotspots.hotspot_id;
SELECT species_name, common_name, habitat_type FROM MarineSpecies WHERE hotspot_id = 2 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species, habitat_type FROM MarineSpecies GROUP BY habitat_type HAVING total_species > 5 ORDER BY total_species DESC;
SELECT hotspot_id, hotspot_name, location, biodiversity_index FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots;
SELECT observation_id, hotspot_id, species_id, observation_date, observer_name FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name, habitat FROM Species WHERE endangered = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_conservation_efforts, conservation_type FROM Conservation_Efforts GROUP BY conservation_type;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots ORDER BY hotspot_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5 ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT hotspot_id) AS total_hotspots FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE conservation_type = 'Protected Area'
SELECT scientific_name, common_name, habitat FROM Species WHERE endangered = TRUE ORDER BY common_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT hotspot_name, observation_date, observer_name FROM Observations JOIN Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots ON Observations.hotspot_id = Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots.hotspot_id ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM Habitats ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species WHERE species_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT observation_id, species_id, observed_location, observed_date FROM Observations WHERE observed_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots;
SELECT hotspot_name, location FROM Marine_Biodiversity_Hotspots WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Conservation_Efforts ORDER BY effort_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_type, species_status FROM Species WHERE species_status = 'Endangered' AND species_category = 'Mammals';
SELECT observation_id, species_id, habitat_id, observed_date FROM Observations WHERE observed_location = 'Coral Reef' ORDER BY observed_date DESC;
